snippet: Australia used its Asian embassies to collect data on China and other countries, according to a document leaked by the former National Security Agency contractor Edward J. Snowden.
abstract: Documents leaked by former National Security Agency contractor Edward J Snowden show that Australia, close ally of the United States, has used its embassies in Asia to collect intelligence as part of NSA's global surveillance efforts.
lead_paragraph: Australia used its Asian embassies to collect data on China and other countries, according to a document leaked by the former National Security Agency contractor Edward J. Snowden.

headline.main: Australia Said to Play Part in N.S.A. Effort
headline.print_headline: Australia Said to Play Part in Effort Of N.S.A.
